name: objc_AssociationPolicy
desc: Type to specify the behavior of an association.

items.name: case OBJC_ASSOCIATION_ASSIGN
items.desc: Specifies a weak reference to the associated object.

items.name: case OBJC_ASSOCIATION_COPY
items.desc: Specifies that the associated object is copied, and that the association is made atomically.

items.name: case OBJC_ASSOCIATION_COPY_NONATOMIC
items.desc: Specifies that the associated object is copied, and that the association is not made atomically.

items.name: case OBJC_ASSOCIATION_RETAIN
items.desc: Specifies a strong reference to the associated object, and that the association is made atomically.

items.name: case OBJC_ASSOCIATION_RETAIN_NONATOMIC
items.desc: Specifies a strong reference to the associated object, and that the association is not made atomically.
